column3: Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health
column5: ﻿Learn to translate knowledge into powerful results as the leader of a public health organization.For more information on the DrPH Program, please visit our website (
column7: All students admitted to the DrPH program, including international students, should complete the financial aid application process. For admitted students with financial need, 50% tuition scholarships are offered for the first two years of the program.
